entry.title: Monday: Partly cloudy. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
